reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Turner is an amazing professor. Her explanations are clear, and she's always willing to help outside of class.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Good professor with a solid understanding of the subject. Sometimes the lectures can be a bit fast-paced.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Decent professor but could be more engaging in her lectures. Labs are well-organized.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Engaging lectures with lots of interesting anecdotes. Assignments are a bit challenging.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Green is one of the best professors I've had. She makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: The professor knows his stuff, but the lectures are too technical and hard to follow.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Very passionate about the subject. Her classes are thought-provoking, but the reading load is heavy.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Okay professor, but he tends to go off-topic during lectures. Exams are fair.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. White is an incredible lecturer. She makes every class engaging and interactive.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Solid professor with a lot of real-world experience. Discussions in class are very insightful.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: The material is interesting, but the lectures are dry and hard to stay focused on.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. Clark is incredibly knowledgeable and passionate about art. Her classes are always enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Decent professor, but sometimes his lectures are hard to follow. Assignments are manageable.

reviews.subject: Business Management
reviews.review: Engaging and practical. Provides lots of real-world examples to illustrate concepts.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Young is passionate and knowledgeable. His classes are both informative and inspiring.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Very thorough in her explanations. Sometimes the material can be dense, but she does a good job breaking it down.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Interesting lectures, but the grading is tough. Be prepared to work hard in this class.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Allen is amazing! She has a deep understanding of music and is very patient with students.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: The course material is difficult, and the professor's teaching style doesn't make it any easier.

reviews.subject: Ethics
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures and discussions. Sometimes the workload is a bit heavy.
